cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Class ThreadController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.ThreadController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadControllerInterface

    public class ThreadController
extends Object
implements ThreadControllerInterface
    Controller ThreadController Class: This is part of the controller that controls a list of comments and modifies the comments in the list passed to the controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadController(Thread threadList)
      Constructor constructs a contoller for the list of comments.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTopic(Comment aComment)
      This method creates a new topic comment in the list.

      This method sorts the list of comments by the date of comments.

      This method sorts the list of comments by the user's location.
      void sortByPicture()
      This method sorts the list of comments by the criteria of having pictures and date.
      void sortBySetLocation(GeoLocation loc)
      This method sorts the list of comments by a set location.
